intro.title: Introduction

content.text1: I always been a addicted to technologies so i quickly be involved in web development when i discover it at MMI training.
content.text2: My expertise comports the creation of ergonomic and modern applications without forgetting communication processes. I also use some Graphic (PAO) and animated elements to bring more dynamism to the web products.
content.text3: I will also apply my technicals languages skills to build tailor-made back offices with frameworks and CMS.

intro.button: See resume for more skills, experiences and my research opportunities

main.content: Currently in an intership of junior fullstack web developer. Swipe left to continue discover about me...

mainTools.seo: Back end development skills : PHP7 object oriented

2019: Second-year university level : Multimedia and internet works
2019-2022: G4 insitute  - Lyon Master degree level : IS management

2019-2022.seotitle: Diploma : Information system manager (data processing and management)

content.title: Back end dev
content.caption: I apply my skills in web integration with CMS like Wordpress or Prestashop. I build websites with Symfony 3 & 4 Php framework, MySQL and AJAX asynchronous methods. For finish i know how create a VM (DNS, Ubuntu, Apache).

content.title: Front end dev
content.caption: I know well about HTML5|CSS3|JS and frameworks like bootstrap. I use SASS prepocessor to get faster. With javascript and libraries ( VueJs and jQuery), good practices and workflows like Webpack i can produce fast loading web app's.

content.title: Graphic design
content.caption: Adobe XD and InVision Studio allow me to conceive User experience on my web creations. Also i use Adobe PAO softwares to create graphic elements and After effect (Lottie js) to generate modern animations in SVG.

seo.title: Graphism
seo.caption: AdobeXD and Invision for design UI. Adobe softwares for create graphics.

content.title: Communication and project management
content.caption:
Applying UX process and analytics tools on web products to catch users behaviours.
Also my new formation going to give me project management skills (Agile and V managements methods).

seo.title: Communication process and project methods
seo.sub: Agile development method ans communication processes
seo.caption: Using V or Agile methods.

rea1.title: Freelance website with Back-office in MySQL / PHP / Ajax
rea1.subtitle: Arinella
rea1.intro: Website for a related person which present a Corsica villa. The options available:

list.1: A home slider highlighting different views of the villa
list.2: An accordion (jQuery UI) showing the different devices
list.3: A dynamic images gallery able to be managed in administration page
list.4: The admin part is protected by a password system and keeped alive with PHP server session. We can manage admin accounts and images in database with the CRUD system (create, read, update, delete).
list.5: A mailing system based on the PHP plugin PHPMailer and Google SMTP server.

seo.date: Project started in July 2018 and i continue to work on it...
seo.link: Link to the digital product stored online

rea1.title: Dynamic website with database
rea1.subtitle: Alt2crous
rea1.intro: We built a website during a school team work which is aimed at finding restaurants around Studying places in the Grenoble city.
rea1.content: Website administration user interface allow to create, read, update, delete (CRUD) in a restaurants database. After an algorithm find a restaurant with price and location settings. Try it, there is some good deals ! (I find he mobile version nice check it) Technologies used : PHP / MySQL / JS / HTML5 / CSS3.

seo.date: This project has started in march 2018 and be finished in april 2018

rea1.title: Web development project based on Wordpress CMS
rea1.subtitle: Les plantes urbaines
rea1.intro: According to an other students mission statement we create a wordpress customizable theme. The options we add are :

list.1: Archive pages for all post or for a specific taxonomy
list.2: Usage of Redux framework to give global customizations options : The user can modify aspects of fonts (titles, paragraphs) and choose backgrounds color (footer, container, header).
list.3: A 3D slider (turntableJs) editable from CMB2 corresponding post metabox
list.4: On a customizable front page we can enable a slider module, add him images and set options like width, height... Also, we can enable an enchance of posts and pick a one from the list
list.5: Creation of modules to show specific contents

rea1.title: HTML/CSS/jQuery Inaprod project
rea1.subtitle: Inaprod
rea1.intro: A school work involving the creation of a mock communication agency. It's a showcase website inspired by flat design and based on the contents of a planned file. We used various Javascript and jQuery plugins like Isotope, Jquery UI, Aos and Jquery easings. We also create our custom icons pack and used animated SVGs.

rea1.title: Final project on wordpress
rea1.subtitle: GCCD project (2th part)
rea1.intro: During this project we could get all the contents of the all 3th semester projects. So we achieve a Wordpress website after creation of some prototypes on Adobe XD. The back office uses Redux themes options to give 3 templates pages for specific events and choosing from a list of articles. We also give template pages for new articles and pages with ability to add pictures and videos.
rea1.content: Other several contents like videos, graphics and articles were synthetized to insert web optimized content and SEO friendly. To conclude this project was very rewarding to improve customer relation skills (I talk about trying to explain web development to a person who uses his desktop keyboard very slowly).

rea1.title: English Stories with Bludit blog CMS
rea1.subtitle: English Stories
rea1.content: This website presents an interactive story around the original first page from 'Ghosts', a novel written by Paul Auster in 1983. Bludit CMS gives a simple structure to modulate blog options. I conceive an interactive story algorithm for the stories follow-up choices. Thanks to Bandersnatch for the idea !

rea2.title: Web game, code written in Typescript (OOP)
rea2.subtitle: Typescript web game
rea2.intro: Production of a simple arcade game and based on a Typescript template and Canvas.
rea2.content: This project is based on oriented object programming with usage of keyboard events to control character. I used methods to control character drawing, directions, positions and destruction. Sorry you can't lose...

rea2.title: Vue js simple web application
rea2.subtitle: Vue js monopage app
rea2.intro: Creation of a simple e-commerce app. The features are :

list.1: An index of players with their availability
list.2: An input form for selling a player
list.3: Button to add a player to basket
list.4: A Simple basket system with quantities and progressive remove

rea2.title: Book realised with Photoshop Indesign and Illustrator
rea2.subtitle: Book of illustrations
rea2.content: Created from a word these paintings are touched up with Camera row and Photoshop. The Typographies are customized with Adobe Illustrator and formatted with InDesign.

rea2.title: Project based on the Wordpress Content manager system
rea2.subtitle: GCCD project (1th part)
rea2.intro: During a week of hard work we've built the 360 degrees communication of the GCCD challenge organized by Grenoble University. The website use the Wordpress CMS to give a custom page template system, customisation options with Redux framework and Youtube videos (API).
rea2.content: Also we create the all contents with an interview of a civil engineering , web articles and a complete graphic charter.
